content: --वीरः {1} a very liberal man. {2} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) the sentiment of heroism arising out of liberality, the sentiment of chivalrous liberality; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} Paraśurāma who gave away the earth with its seven continents; <ab>cf.</ab> the instance given in <ls>R. G.</ls> under दानवीरः-कियदिदमधिकं मे यद्द्विजायार्थयित्रे कवचमरमणीयं कुंडलं चार्पयामि . अकरुणमवकृत्य द्राक्कृपाणन निर्यद्बहलरुधिरधारं मौलिमावेदयामि ...
